constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 193 (Wednesday, November 3, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. CURTIS:
H.R. 5837.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8 of the United States Constitution.
[Page H6179]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to expand access to telehealth services relating to substance use disorder treatment, and for other purposes.
